bandana.name: Bandana
bandana.description: A simple cloth bandana, slightly frayed.

leather_pirate_hat.name: Leather Pirate Hat
leather_pirate_hat.description: A sturdy leather pirate hat that offers decent protection.

feathered_tricorn.name: Feathered Tricorn
feathered_tricorn.description: An ornate tricorn hat adorned with colorful feathers.

captains_hat.name: Captain's Hat
captains_hat.description: A decorated hat worn by pirate captains, symbol of authority.

enchanted_compass.name: Enchanted Compass
enchanted_compass.description: A magical compass that always points to what you desire most.

navy_medal.name: Navy Medal
navy_medal.description: A medal awarded for valor in the navy, increases respect among sailors.

mayors_ring.name: Mayor's Ring
mayors_ring.description: A gold ring worn by the town mayor, often used to seal important documents.

linen_shirt.name: Linen Shirt
linen_shirt.description: A lightweight linen shirt, comfortable but offers little protection.

striped_shirt.name: Striped Shirt
striped_shirt.description: A simple striped shirt, a bit faded from the sun.

pirate_coat.name: Pirate Coat
pirate_coat.description: A rugged pirate coat that offers solid protection.

captains_jacket.name: Captain's Jacket
captains_jacket.description: A finely tailored jacket befitting a ship captain.

cotton_trousers.name: Cotton Trousers
cotton_trousers.description: Simple cotton trousers, comfortable for travel but not very sturdy.

tattered_pants.name: Tattered Pants
tattered_pants.description: Old pants with several patches and tears.

sailor_trousers.name: Sailor Trousers
sailor_trousers.description: Durable trousers suitable for life at sea.

pirate_breeches.name: Pirate Breeches
pirate_breeches.description: Stylish breeches favored by seasoned pirates.

worn_boots.name: Worn Boots
worn_boots.description: Old boots that have seen many voyages.

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.description: Sturdy leather boots that provide decent protection.

captains_boots.name: Captain's Boots
captains_boots.description: Elegant boots worn by ship captains.

admirals_sabre.name: Admiral's Sabre
admirals_sabre.description: A finely crafted sabre carried by navy admirals.

trident.name: Trident
trident.description: A three-pronged spear wielded by merfolk warriors.

wraith_blade.name: Wraith Blade
wraith_blade.description: A ghostly blade that chills the soul, used by wraith captains.

cannon.name: Cannon
cannon.description: A large naval cannon capable of firing heavy cannonballs.

rusty_cutlass.name: Rusty Cutlass
rusty_cutlass.description: A well-worn blade with chips and rust spots

silver_sword.name: Silver Sword
silver_sword.description: A finely crafted blade that gleams in the light

flintlock_pistol.name: Flintlock Pistol
flintlock_pistol.description: A single-shot pistol with a flintlock mechanism

blunderbuss.name: Blunderbuss
blunderbuss.description: A short-barreled firearm that fires a spread of shot

pistol_ammo.name: Pistol Ammo
pistol_ammo.description: A single round of ammunition for flintlock pistols

blunderbuss_ammo.name: Blunderbuss Ammo
blunderbuss_ammo.description: A single round of ammunition for blunderbusses

cannonball.name: Cannonball
cannonball.description: A solid iron cannonball for ship cannons

chainshot.name: Chainshot
chainshot.description: Two smaller cannonballs linked by a chain, used to damage sails and rigging

silver_bullet.name: Silver Bullet
silver_bullet.description: A special bullet made of silver, effective against supernatural foes

explosive_cannonball.name: Explosive Cannonball
explosive_cannonball.description: A cannonball filled with gunpowder that explodes on impact

explosive_barrel.name: Explosive Barrel
explosive_barrel.description: A barrel filled with gunpowder that can be ignited to cause a large explosion

leviathan_scale.name: Leviathan Scale
leviathan_scale.description: A massive scale from the legendary Leviathan, grants temporary invulnerability.

rum_bottle.name: Bottle of Rum
rum_bottle.description: Strong liquor that warms the soul

kraken_ink.name: Kraken Ink
kraken_ink.description: A vial of ink from a kraken, can be used to create a smokescreen

healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: A magical elixir that mends wounds

torn_map_fragment.name: Torn Map Fragment
torn_map_fragment.description: A weathered scrap of parchment showing part of a treasure map. It looks like it could be important.

sturdy cutlass.description: A well-balanced steel cutlass, sharper than a rusty one. Increases combat effectiveness.
sturdy cutlass.name: Sturdy Cutlass

Sturdy Sword.description: A well-balanced steel sword, more reliable than a rusty cutlass.
Sturdy Sword.name: Sturdy Sword

blacksmith_hammer.description: A sturdy iron hammer used for forging, capable of delivering crushing blows in combat.
blacksmith_hammer.name: Heavy Blacksmith's Hammer

Leather Jerkin.description: Reinforced leather armor offering decent protection.
Leather Jerkin.name: Leather Jerkin

Iron Shield.description: A sturdy iron shield, can block melee attacks.
Iron Shield.name: Iron Shield
